name: Galaxy Shooter 2D (danio.quero)
description:
My first attempt on game developing. Rough as hell, but a child of mine. Hope you may enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed developing it.

It's a Galaga-like arcade spaceshooter made of 3 levels. You can collect temporary upgrades and encounter several enemy types.

Use:arrow keys for movement

  • space for shooting
  • left shift for boost
  • C for rapid powerup collection
